#summary Building VTP on Mac OS X.
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

VTP has been building on OS X for several years by a few developers.  VTP on OS X is very functional, but with a few bugs that are nuisances. These will be fixed soon, we hope. *Individuals who just want to run* the apps can request a download at:
[http://www.vterrain.org/Request/ download request].


== Building ==

Currently, a set of download/build/install scripts are maintained in a separate repository.

Instructions can be found [http://nino.walker.googlepages.com/vterrainmacosxinstallscripts here]
